plot: Felix discovers that he has the power to hypnotize, and uses that power to cause trouble and annoy people. However, a dangerous escaped hippopotamus threatens to cause more trouble than Felix ever could, and people turn to Felix for help.
title: Felix 'Hyps' the Hippo
plot_es: Felix discovers that he has the power to hypnotize, and uses that power to cause trouble and annoy people. However, a dangerous escaped hippopotamus threatens to cause more trouble than Felix ever could, and people turn to Felix for help.
plot_en: Felix discovers that he has the power to hypnotize, and uses that power to cause trouble and annoy people. However, a dangerous escaped hippopotamus threatens to cause more trouble than Felix ever could, and people turn to Felix for help.
